Posts.Content: I’ve been on the combo for 3-1/2 years. So far so good. Fingers always crossed. Side effects tolerable but the thinning and wiry hair is a pain.
Posts.Title: Ibrance and letrozole combo

Posts.Content: Thank you for posting ‘your hair like wire’. I thought it was just old age. I had really nice hair, not thick, but very nice and manageable. Now it’s a hot mess. I knew the thinning was the medicine but didn’t realize the texture could change as well. There’s something comforting knowing I’m not the only one. Any suggestions.? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Ibrance and letrozole combo
